Task.Param: people= SELECT emp.person_id AS UID, emp.first_name AS FNAME, emp.last_name AS LNAME, emp.middle_name AS MNAME, emp.prefix_name AS PRENAME, emp.suffix_name AS SUFNAME, emp.full_name AS FULLNAME, emp.official_name AS BUSNAME, emp.pref_title AS TITLE, emp.email_address AS EMAIL, emp.work_phone AS PHONE, emp.work_fax AS FAX, login.login_name AS NETID FROM person AS emp LEFT JOIN user AS login ON emp.person_id = login.person_id AND login.expired = 0 WHERE emp.publish_ok = 1
